<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Sulfur Zombie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1377)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Glowing with a dull amber light, these odious creatures spawn from a combination of necromancy and fire. These destructive creations sow chaos and demolish fortifications, making them the bane of besieged cities.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Zombie_SulfurZombie.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Sulfur Zombie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1377)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=245" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 303</row>

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A sulfur zombie is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) and can't use reactions

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +10 

</row>

**HP** 125
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), fire, [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) 5, slashing 5

**Death Throes** When a sulfur zombie dies, its body explodes in a 30-foot burst of fire and debris that deals 2d10 bludgeoning and 2d10 fire damage to each creature in the area (DC 21 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +17,
**Damage** 2d6+5 bludgeoning plus 1d6 [persistent fire](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) and blinding sulfur

**Blinding Sulfur**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93)) A sulfur zombie burns with putrid inner fire. A creature hit by a sulfur zombie's fist Strike must attempt a DC 22 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=1) for 1 round, or for 1 minute on a critical failure.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-103" />
